Some processes may be abandoned later when post-implementation reviews show limited value, while others may be implemented, as gaps are uncovered or needs change.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Today the library ITIL has become the de facto standard in the description of the fundamental ITSM processes.
